meta.name: description
meta.content: Neah-Kah-Nie School District is commited to rigor – We are challenged by each other to learn more. The Neah-Kah-Nie School District is made up of Staff, Students, Parents, and Residents of the communities we serve. Working together, we are accomplishing some amazing things at our five schools.
